document.full_text: mr. traylor, 34, who played seven seasons in the n.b.a. and whose wide frame earned him the nickname tractor, was found dead in his apartment in puerto rico.
document.title: robert traylor, a center known for filling the lane, dies at 34
lines_and_colors: mr. traylor, 34, who played seven seasons in the n.b.a. and whose wide frame earned him the nickname tractor, was found dead in his apartment in puerto rico.
